content: basic santa hat worked from the top down in one single piece adult child and infant sizes included in pattern materials needed 1 2 colors worsted weight yarn 100-200 yards each -color a main body of hat -color b brim and pompom 2 size i-9 5 5mm and size h-8 5 0mm crochet hooks 3 stitch marker 4 pompom maker if preferred 5 yarn needle for sewing in ends optional use a 3rd color of yarn and your yarn needle to cross-stitch a name or initials on the brim of the hat
